Calculate the present value of a 10-year annuity-due of 1000 with $i=5\%$.

Asking SymPy...

Using the formula for annuity-due:

$$\ddot{a}_{\overline{n}|} = \frac{1 - v^n}{d}$$

Verified from Life Contingencies P.42
